Title: Stakeout
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Laura McCreary, Tricia McAlpin, Gabe Liedman (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (story editor), Matt O'Brien (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake and Boyle go on a stakeout, Rosa shows interest in Holt's nephew, and Terry writes a book for his daughters.
